content.raw:
About failing to move the robot, starting the arenas 6 and using a set_pose command, will end up with the robot falling:

```
rostopic pub -1 /atlas/set_pose geometry_msgs/Pose '{ position: { x: -11, y: -34 ,z: 0.94 }, orientation: {x: 0, y: 0, z: 0, w: 1 } }'
```

I'm probably missing something.
